author: Special Correspondent
text:
R. Prabhakara Raya, Dean, School of Management, Pondicherry Central University has been appointed Vice Chancellor in charge of the University.

This follows the Deanship of Prof. Anisa Basheer Khan, who was holding the post of VC-in-charge, having expired on February 27.

An order from the University Registrar-in-charge J. Sampath said Prof. Raya, who is the next senior most Dean shall perform the functions of the Vice Chancellor as per Statute 1 (A) 7 from February 28 to March 7, 2016, or until the existing Vice Chancellor (who has been put on compulsory wait) resumes duty or a new VC is appointed, whichever is earlier.
title: Prabhakara Raya appointed V-C in-charge
